关于DeepSeek的教程，论坛收集整理过清华大学出品的5份教程 <font color="inherit">《清华大学：DeepSeek学习手册：（全5册）》</font>，涵盖了DeepSeek入门、职场应用、生活、科研等方面。<font color="#191b1f"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font size="3">今天我发现北大也出品了一份DeepSeek教程，是关于讲解DeepSeek的应用的，</font></font></font><font color="#191b1f"><font face="-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font size="3">无需专业的AI和大模型背景也能看懂，可为我们的工作生活提效</font></font></font><img id="aimg_z4RNf" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/510573567/2025/02/1_23f452f8e2311.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/510573567/2025/02/1_23f452f8e2311.png"><img id="aimg_SZ0P2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="1035" height="624" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/510573567/2025/02/2_e858481d93d21.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/510573567/2025/02/2_e858481d93d21.png"><img id="aimg_sH0xo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/510573567/2025/02/3_24290ffbcd7f6.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/510573567/2025/02/3_24290ffbcd7f6.png"><br>
